hero.subheading: Our goal is to take your company's digital transformation to the next level. From captivating websites to intelligent chatbots and automated processes, I offer tailored solutions to help you stand out in an increasingly digital world.

services.heading: How I can improve your business

items.title: Integrated Digital Strategy
items.description: I assist you in creating a complete digital strategy. From defining your goals to implementing concrete solutions, I work with you to build a clear and measurable plan to drive your business growth.

items.title: Process Documentation (SOPs)
items.description: I create standard operating procedures and manuals to ensure every task and operation in your business is documented and easy to replicate.

items.title: Process Automation
items.description: I implement tools like chatbots, workflows, and custom systems to save you time and money.

items.title: AI Agent Development
items.description: Automate complex processes and drive innovation within your organization by integrating advanced AI solutions tailored to your specific needs.

items.title: Digital Tools Optimization
items.description: I simplify your processes by removing unnecessary tools and replacing them with integrated workflows tailored to your business.

howItWorks.heading: Progressing Through Digital Phases
howItWorks.description: Every company has its own path to digital transformation. My goal is to help you identify your current phase and guide you toward a more efficient, automated model aligned with today's market demands. Together, we can build systems that optimize your time, reduce costs, and prepare your business for the future.

phases.title: Analog Operations
points: Minimal or no use of digital tools.

phases.title: Cloud Silos
points: Use of basic digital tools (Google Workspace, Excel).

phases.title: Integrated Cloud
points: Better data flow, but with semi-manual processes.

phases.title: Unified Data Layer
points: All data centralized in a single platform.
Decisions are based on accurate, real-time information.

phases.title: Automated Workflows
points: Human intervention limited to key decisions.

phases.title: AI Automation
points: Implementation of artificial intelligence for predictive tasks.
